title: CONTEST!! Win a $700 absoluteBLACK HOLLOWcage derailleur upgrade…and more!!!
content:
There are oversized pulley cages, and then there’s the absoluteBLACK HOLLOWcage OSPW system. With the most unique looks on the market, and a wild design that puts the bearings as far out as possible, it’s one of the most interesting upgrades you can make to your road bike.

absoluteBLACK claims it’s lighter, quieter, more aerodynamic, and reduces drag better than other oversized pulley systems on the market, and now you can win one of these $699 cages for your Shimano Dura-Ace R9000 or Ultegra R8000 rear derailleur!

absoluteBLACK is also giving away two bottles of their $145 GRAPHENlube wax chain lube! All you have to do is answer a few short questions and a valid email below to be entered to win!

SURVEY CONTEST RULES: By submitting your response, you agree to these rules, terms & conditions: Only one entry per person. Multiple entries from same person will disqualify that person. All participants must provide a valid email address, as that is how absoluteBLACK will contact the winner(s). All entrants’ email addresses may be added to the email newsletter/marketing lists for Bikerumor.com and absoluteBLACK. Any emails sent from either party will contain “unsubscribe” options. Contest closes just before midnight (11:59pm) PST on Saturday, August 28th, 2021. Winner(s) will be selected at random and results are final. Winner(s) will have one week from the date of notification of winning to respond, after which absoluteBLACK and/or Bikerumor.com reserve the right to choose an alternate winner and original winner forfeits all right to any prize(s).
author: Ron Frazelle
